20110108010029.000|20110108010031.000|CC1|PRISON INMATE SERVING TIME FOR  
20110108010031.000|20110108010032.000|CC1|SIMILAR CRIMES INVESTIGATED BY  
20110108010032.000|20110108010034.000|CC1|THE L.A.P.D.                    
20110108010034.000|20110108010037.000|CC1|>> THAT CASE RESULTED IN TWO SEX

20110108010043.000|20110108010045.000|CC1|CENTER IN LOS ANGELES.          
20110108010045.000|20110108010047.000|CC1|>> Reporter: THE L.A.P.D. ALSO  
20110108010047.000|20110108010049.000|CC1|RECOGNIZES SUSPECT ONE, BUT HIS 
20110108010049.000|20110108010050.000|CC1|NAME HAS NOT BEEN RELEASED.     
20110108010050.000|20110108010052.000|CC1|THE IDENTITIES OF THE OTHER TWO 
20110108010052.000|20110108010054.000|CC1|SUSPECTS ARE STILL UNKNOWN, BUT 
20110108010054.000|20110108010055.000|CC1|MORE DISTURBING INFORMATION IS  
20110108010055.000|20110108010057.000|CC1|EMERGING IN THE CASE.

20110108010116.000|20110108010117.000|CC1|PARTICULAR AT THAT LOCATION.
